      • getItemVectors

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.Long2DoubleMap> getItemVectors()
        Load the data into memory, indexed by item.
        Returns:
        A map from item IDs to item rating vectors. Each vector contains users' ratings for the item, keyed by user ID.
